Package itec3030.smarthome.standards

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BooleanMeasurmentInstrument
    Special kind of a SmartThing that offers true/false readings (e.g.
    Controllable
    An object is controllable if we can add something that implements a ControllerInterface to it.
    ControllerInterface
    Objects that are able to control SmartThings must be able to receive change messages from the SmartThings they control.
    Furnace
    A Furnace SmartThing
    NumericMeasurementInstrument
    A special kind of a SmartThing that offers integer readings (e.g.
    OnOffAble
    A special kind of a SmartThing that can be turned on or off.
    SmartThing
    A generic smart thing.
    TemperatureSensor
    A Sensor that measure temperature, as an integer
    Thermostat
    A Sensor that measure temperature, as an integer
